de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka

Class MarbleLabyrinthControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka.MarbleLabyrinthControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ButtonListener, ResetListener, NetworkDataSink

    public class MarbleLabyrinthControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkDataSink, ResetListener, ButtonListener
    This class may be used for controlling the robot in a marble-labyrinth friendly way. Only the two topmost joints are moved.

      • FLIP_ROTATOR_BUTTON

        static final int FLIP_ROTATOR_BUTTON
        Button ids for swapping the movement direction for tilting/rotating action

        NOTE: if you change theses ids, you're gonna have a bad time. see onButtonClick(ButtonClick, NetworkDevice)
